participant_1.background:
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
I'm going to hike some of the Appalachian Trail with my dragon friend.
i m a simple man.
I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best.

participant_2.background:
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
i want to visit the uk.
I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself.
I spent time with my family and friends.
i do not like broccoli.

content.text: Good! It's a beautiful day in Toronto!
That's awesome! I hope you enjoy it.
Thanks! I'm planning on spending some time with my family and my black lab.
That sounds like a great plan! I spent my birthday with my family and my French bulldog.
Aww, that's so sweet! I love French bulldogs.
Me too! They're the best dogs.
I agree! I love how they're always so happy and playful.
Me too! They're the best dogs to have around.
I'm glad we agree! Have you ever been to the UK?
No, I haven't. But I've always wanted to go.
It's a beautiful place! You should definitely go sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
